title: TOURIST LOOKING FOR GAY FRIENDLY GRAB DRIVER TO FERRY HIM AND PARTNER IN SG
text:
TOURIST LOOKING FOR GAY FRIENDLY GRAB DRIVER TO FERRY HIM AND PARTNER IN SG   Advertisement 
Please see the attached screenshot from grabhitch Singapore community facebook page. 
This ang moh tourist asked specifically for Grab drivers who are gay friendly. He said that he and his gay partner will be arriving in Singapore in 6 days' time. Are there any gay drivers willing to ferry him around Singapore? 
Anonymous 
A.S.S. Contributor Editor's Note: 
If not, why not give us a 'Like' ? Filed Under:
